);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))

bookSourceComment:
自己花了差不多一下午做出来的，第一次做的书源。特此发出来给自己纪念一下，也不算是完全自己做的吧。这个书源之前有大佬做了一下那个发现，只做了一个那个最新那个列表，其他的都是我看着关耳大佬的视频和那个规则自己一边抄一边写下来的。那个发现列表里面的那些规则是我把直接把源代码给了AI之后，然后再给他那个格式，让他照着格式给我写出来的！还有那个搜索，不知道为啥我做到一半之前好好的，然后突然又搜不出来了，可能之前的大佬也是因为搜不出来所以就没有做搜索那个规则吧？我自己照着关耳大佬的视频抄的不知道什么时候失效，失效了也不要找我，因为我真的是个小白，我也不会改。
                                        ——特此纪念
                                   ——by.Lai

}

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*
ruleSearch.name: $.articlename

[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function headUrl(url){
    var count = url.split('/').length-1;
    var a=url.slice(23,url.indexOf('/',23));
     return 'https://www.hujuge.com/'+a+'/1/index.html';
}
java.setContent(result,null);
let a1=java.getElement('class.result c-container xpath-log new-pmd').toString().split('<div class="result c-container xpath-log new-pmd"').map(value => '<div class="result c-container xpath-log new-pmd"' + value);
let a2=java.getElement('class.result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd').toString().split('<div class="result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd"').map(value => '<div class="result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd"' + value);
let a=a1.concat(a2);
java.log(a.length);
var b = [];
for (let i =0;i<a.length;i++) {
    var str =org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(a[i]);
    var list={};
    let realU=str.select('span.c-color-gray').text();
    if(!realU.includes('hujuge')){
        continue;
    }else{
        list["title"]=str.select('h3').select('a').text();
        java.log(list["title"]);
        list["author"]=str.select('span.c-font-normal c-color-gray2 article-span_UGCkY').text();
        java.log(list["author"]);
        list["intro"]=str.select('span.content-right_8Zs40').html();
        if(list["intro"]==null||list["intro"]==''){
         list["intro"]=str.select('span.text_2NOr6').html();
        }
        java.log(list["intro"]);
        list["url"]=str.select('div[mu]').attr('mu').toString();
        list["url"] =headUrl(list["url"]);
        java.log(list["url"]);
        b.push(list);
    }
}
b;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
chapterPageBeat = java.get("chapterPageBeat");
chapterUrl = java.get("chapterUrl");
chapterName = java.get("chapterName");

sourceUrl1 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1];
java.log(sourceUrl1);
sourceUrl2 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\/[\/a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1]
java.log(sourceUrl2);

if(chapterPageBeat!=""){
f=new RegExp(chapterPageBeat,"i");
cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").match(f)[1];
}
else{cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").replace(/>\s+</g, "><");}

var chapterList = [];
name = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterName,"g"));
url = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterUrl,"g"));

for(var i = 0; i < name.length; i ++){
text = name[i].match(chapterName)[1];
uri = url[i].match(chapterUrl)[1];

if(uri.indexOf("/") == -1){
	 	href=sourceUrl2 +"/"+ uri;
	 	}else{href = sourceUrl1 + uri;}
	 	href = href +","+ JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer":href}})
	 	
chapterList.push({
		 	  text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
 }

chapterList
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@h3@text}}･{{@@.tabvalue@table@tbody@td.2@text##.*：|\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
